website_summaries.verdict: Spoons have an expensive look and feel to them at an inexpensive price point.
pros: Spoons feel thick, heavy, and built to last
The minimalist design can be easily incorporated into your existing silverware set
Edges are all smooth and rounded
9-inch spoons fit comfortably in your hands
cons: Spoons advertised as dishwasher safe without any detergent

customer_reviews.title: Who knew a spoon could change your life?!
customer_reviews.text: After years of stirring drinks in tall glasses with regular tea spoons I decide to look on Amazon for tall spoons. I bought two sets of these so I would have 8. We use them all the time now! In addition to not getting your fingers wet when you stir a drink, they are perfect for getting mayonnaise out the bottom of the jar! The simple sleek designs doesn't match my flatware set exactly, but goes very well with it. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: L.V. Short

customer_reviews.title: So many uses once you have them!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was thinking these would be good for the occasional milkshake or root beer float. As tools in the kitchen they have proven to be much more capable. For example, reaching down to the bottom of ketchup bottle. What do you have in your kitchen that can do that? These little long spoons are sturdy so the don't bend under torque, and are comfortable to handle. Get yourself a little something and acquire a set. I really like mine, use 'em every week for unexpected uses.
customer_reviews.author: D L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect spoons
customer_reviews.text: I love these spoons! I use tall mugs for my coffee and these are perfect for stirring without sticking my fingers into the hot liquid. Plus, the best part is that the spoon itself is just about a perfect teaspoon amount of sugar - which I have to limit, so no more "over sugaring" my coffee by using a soup spoon!! These spoons are made of a heavier material so they don't feel cheaply made. I really love them. Thanks for a great product and wonderful service. They arrived way before I thought they would!!
customer_reviews.author: Kokomo618

customer_reviews.title: It’s about time!
customer_reviews.text: I have been needing spoons of this type for years!!! Finally, I decided to just do it and purchase 4. I’m not an avid iced tea drinker, but an occasional ice cream soda, any time of year, is a treat for guests and myself as well. However, my real purpose for purchasing is to get at any food stuck at the bottom of a container too deep or too narrow to reach the food. No more frustration. Love these spoons! Go with any tableware style.
customer_reviews.author: MDaub

customer_reviews.title: Useful and pretty item
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those items that you didn't know you wanted until you saw it on lightning deals at a great price! So I bought it and told my husband he was getting me this for part of a Christmas gift. I read both good and bad reviews, but I'd like to give a GOOD review. They are simple but very pretty, and I know they will be useful not only as great tea stirrers but also for getting the last of something out of a jar.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Best Iced-tea long-handled spoons!
customer_reviews.text: I love these spoons! They finally fit my 30 Oz glasses. With my standard ice tea spoons my fingers always get in my tea! Yuck!!! But these long-handled tea spoons are perfect. And they're very sturdy if you're a milkshake lover like my husband. They also went through the dishwasher just fine. Will definitely buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Biehl

customer_reviews.title: Smaller Scoop
customer_reviews.text: These are longer, thinner spoons, with smaller scoops, than the long-handled teaspoons I am replacing. In the picture, the Hiware spoon is the one closest to the ruler. They are still good spoons, and I’ll use them. They’re just different from what I expected and what I’m used to.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Poling

customer_reviews.title: Many Uses!!!
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are great for so many things. Perfect as baby spoons, round and small. They can be sterilized in the dishwasher; the plastic coated actual baby spoons should not. In most of the South iced tea comes with the sugar boiled in. Not in FL. In FL sweetened iced tea comes with a sugar bowl. You really need an ice tea spoon. You want to get the last of the peanut butter, mayonnaise and etc out of a jar; you need one of these ice tea spoons. On and on I can go.. they look expensive and really dress a luncheon table. I depend on them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Sooons are sturdy but the size of the actual spoon is a joke. Bought them for root beer floats. It's so small, I went back to a regular teaspoon:-(.
customer_reviews.author: Pam S

customer_reviews.title: A durable, good looking, everyday multipurpose tool
customer_reviews.text: These are outstanding long-handled spoons. Quietly stylish, sturdy and comfortable enough to eat with and use every day. Got these for stirring tall cold summer drinks but use them for all sorts of jobs now. Buttering pastries, easily spooning condiments from jars no matter how tall they are and for eating desserts as well. And are washing well in dishwasher. Even useful for stirring cake and other batters. They are becoming one of my standard kitchen multipurpose tools.
customer_reviews.author: Hcantwell

customer_reviews.title: Finally looked for long spoons to stir drinks with. Perfect. Nice quailty
customer_reviews.text: So finally after years of stirring drinks in tall glasses with regular tea spoons I decide to look on Amazon for tall spoons. My parents had long spoons when I was growing up and I finally looked around for them. There great. They feel very durable and not easily bent. Great for mixing drinks. They are as described. 9 inches long. Come in handy for getting olives out of deep jars and scraping out miracle whip from the bottom of the jar also. Sure they don't match my other utensils but that is just fine. They work for what I got them for. Everybody should own a set.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Useable
customer_reviews.text: These are iced tea spoons, however, they are seconds (production flaws), still useable. Will use them for myself, not for guests.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Rough edges
customer_reviews.text: I need these very occasionally so the set of four will come in handy. My only issue is the edge is not smooth. In fact, it could use sanding so it will not scratch, scrape or cut inside the mouth, lips or on the tongue. That’s my next project and I hope it’ll be an easy one.
customer_reviews.author: kittybits

customer_reviews.title: Attracted to the price, kept the spoons for the quality.
customer_reviews.text: I use long-handled spoons (aka "parfait spoons" or "iced tea" spoons) for so much more than just drinking. They're handy for home-mixed chocolate milk, cocktails, even mixing sauces or hot foods. This 4-pack was the best deal I could find on Amazon for the price. It was an added bonus that these handles are about an inch and a half longer than my old iced tea spoons, which made them even more useful around the kitchen. My old spoons have lasted over 20 years and are of stainless steel, so I hope that these new ones last just as long, if not longer!
customer_reviews.author: L. Cris

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great iced tea spoons! I use them for reaching the bottom of the peanut butter jar and many other things. These are about an inch and a half longer than my vintage ice tea spoons are. Excellent price! Google how much this iced tea spoons cost at other sites.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: These spoon is exactly what I was looking for in a long handle spoon. I bought them for mixing drinks in tall glasses. I like the thickness/sturdiness. They're slightly smaller than a teaspoon and has a 9" inch handle.
customer_reviews.author: Panter

customer_reviews.title: These spoons take you back in time.
customer_reviews.text: I like making my own ice cream sundaes. I can use tall, thin glass jars and fill it with ice cream, syrup, nuts, whipping cream and a cherry on top just like the old soda fountain sundaes from the old soda jerk scenes from the movies or TV shows. These spoons help me dig to the bottom and not lose a delicious spoonful of it all. The tallness and sturdiness of the spoon give me a good grip with each dig into the sundae. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: sparkyguy

customer_reviews.title: Almond. Butter.
customer_reviews.text: I make a smoothie daily that has almond butter in it. These spoons have made a daily task tidier and more fun. They can reach to the bottom of even a big Costco jar of almond butter, and they have no problem scooping out a bigger amount than you would expect based on the size of the bowl of the spoon. I love them. If you have a household that consumes a lot of nut butter, like we do, I would say these spoons are worth buying. They seem to hold up to the dishwasher just fine, although I tend to hand wash them, because almond butter.
customer_reviews.author: Star-Struck Stella

customer_reviews.title: What once was lost now has been found!
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought they weren't delivered but when I went to the garage to start breaking down the Amazon boxes for recycling, there they were in one of the boxes buried under the protective bubble wrap. Thanks to a teenage son who does not always pay attention 😊 So I was very happy to see them and they are excellent. They're​ heavy and made with good quality will probably buy some more which was the only reason why I bought 4 of them was to see if they were durable or not.
customer_reviews.author: Nebraska Ken

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to get honey out of the jar
customer_reviews.text: The local farm honey comes in 2 lb plastic bottles, so when it crystallizes it's nearly impossible to get out. I've been searching for a long-handled spoon with a small enough head to scoop the honey out, and this fits perfectly. (No, I'm not going to heat the honey jar to liquefy it to get it out of the bottle.) The simple handle style goes with all my other flatware as well.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: I like them!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted some long handled teaspoons for my flavored water and ice cream sodas. These really fit the bill. To me they're sturdy enough for what I'll use them for, the finish has no small imperfections, they're weighted nicely, comes in a set of four and they were economical. What's not to love? If the finish turns on me I'll revisit this review.
customer_reviews.author: Zaftig227

customer_reviews.title: Long and strong.
customer_reviews.text: I stir coffee and additives every morning in my large coffee cup. Anytime I use mayonnaise, I use these long spoons. I don’t like the mayonnaise bottle that squirt out. It squirts too much at once for a sandwich. These are wonderful for root beer floats too. I love them so much, I bought 2 each for my daughter and daughter-in-law. They love them too.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy R

customer_reviews.title: Finally an iced tea spoon handle!
customer_reviews.text: I have been married for over 35 years, but have never owned iced tea teaspoons with long handles. I don't drink tea, but I do have trouble with some powdered supplements in tall containers. These spoons do the trick well. They seem to smaller than a true teaspoon, but I haven't scientifically tested that yet.
customer_reviews.author: D Dee

customer_reviews.title: Confusing description great seller
customer_reviews.text: the seller got these here on time everything was fine but the description does not match what they actually are what they are are drinks stirers not ice cream spoons, there's a big difference ice cream spoons are big are these are small at the end of the handle is long but the bottom to get the ice cream out is not it's just a mix a drink!
customer_reviews.author: LJW1970

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I got these for iced tea spoons but they are really too long for that. More like an ice cream sundae spoon. Nice quality and I will keep anyway as iced tea spoons are hard to find when they’re not in a set. Hard to store because, as stated in the description, they are 9 inches long. Price was good.
customer_reviews.author: SPD123

customer_reviews.title: Nice spoons!
customer_reviews.text: They have a nice shine and finish to them, and look nice. The color blends with my Cambridge fine silverware which is patterned. These do not, but they coordinate nicely. The handle's not too skinny and easy to hold. I use them for stirring beverages but also find myself using them for other things. I've put these in dishwasher over and over and they're perfect. Does the trick, good spoons
customer_reviews.author: Katarina7405

customer_reviews.title: Well made of stainless steel.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for ice cream sodas as well as ice tea spoons. I was not able to locate these anywhere else. If anyone remembers when you used to buy an ice cream soda they gave you a spoon like this to get the ice cream out of the soda, which always sunk to the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer reporter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: We make our own smoothies and have struggled with regular spoons to get to the bottom of the glass. These are perfect, and make eating nutritious smoothies seem like a sinful dessert. They are very sturdy and smooth, and comfortable to hold.
customer_reviews.author: E. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for backpacking meals on the trail
customer_reviews.text: I actually ordered thee spoons for backpacking. We eat reconstituted dehydrated meals out of freezer bags, and short spoons often mean you end up dipping your hand in the bag to reach your food. These long spoons are perfect for dipping into the freezer bags. Now, I realize they are a little heavier than most backpacking utensils, but they don't weigh that much, and the durability and length is perfect for being in the backwoods for multiple days. I'm the most fashionable diner on the trail. HA! lol
customer_reviews.author: seafan

customer_reviews.title: nice long stem
customer_reviews.text: If you've ever had sticky fingers from trying to get that jam from the bottom of the jar then you'll understand why I bought these spoons. Granted, they're not fancy but I don't care. they're sturdy and I'm sure they'll last a good long time. Overall great quality for the money. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jim v

customer_reviews.title: Not 18/8 Stainless Steel - Otherwise Nice
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy long-handled spoons that look nice but the ones I received were not 18/8 stainless steel as advertised. If they were, they would not be attracted to magnets and magnets stick very well to the spoons I received. That indicates a lower quality of stainless steel -- perhaps 18/0. They will do the job, but I do not expect them to last as long as ones made of 18/8 steel.
customer_reviews.author: John Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband because he drinks his coffee in tall travelers mugs. He adores them, they reach the bottom to stir in the cream and sugar, and he likes having his special coffee spoons. It’s all about the little things!
customer_reviews.author: MarieKT

customer_reviews.title: Rough edges 😔
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the spoons... And the length... And the strength... But they cut my lips when using. Swing and a miss
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M

customer_reviews.title: perfect frozen-shake spoons
customer_reviews.text: I like to get fast-food milkshakes and put them in the freezer overnight. Eating them requires a long, strong spoon that doesn't dig into your hand. These spoons are perfect -- long and strong, with a fairly thick handle, and a smooth plain surface that's easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Other Horses

customer_reviews.title: Well they work
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about a long handled spoon? Handle is long enough, material seems sturdy enough and the spoon is about the right size for my needs. I think the price is a wee bit steep for what they are but 20 years from now assuming they last that long it wont matter at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lifelong Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as planned. They look nice, are sturdy and work perfect for what I purchased them them. (Keto Mason Jar IceCream made in a Ninja. Tired of getting my hand all sticky reaching for the last little bit at the bottom). Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I wash in dishwasher and no rust, dullness or issues. Perfect for my coffee station.
customer_reviews.author: Erin100

customer_reviews.title: It’s a weight problem!
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are not weighted properly. The end of the handle is heavier than the spoon portion itself so when you put it in a bowl of something like applesauce the end of the handle causes the spoon to plop out of the bowl and you have a mess. I’ve never seen this before. Strange!
customer_reviews.author: scrappy quilter

customer_reviews.title: Long handle
customer_reviews.text: For the price their great.. But for me too long of s handle.i didn't need a 9" I should have gotten a 7" Also the spoon is actually way too small for a float like we thought we were buying But they r sturdy
customer_reviews.author: January

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to the coffee bar
customer_reviews.text: I've stepped away from disposable coffee stirrers and decided to go for the reusable, multi-purpose spoon! ;) These are attractive, do a great job at transferring sugar into my cup, and are the perfect length for stirring hot and cold coffee. A total bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect utensil makes stirring & scooping easy!
customer_reviews.text: Tried a set of these sturdy long handled spoons for stirring my daily coffee in my tall thermos. Perfect! Liked these spoons so much that I ordered a 2nd set. Great for tall glasses, deep bowls, getting to bottom of packages, etc . Simple & elegant. Spoon bowl is not huge and that is fine with me.
customer_reviews.author: MerryAllDay!

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Used for soda floats on the last day of school & the kids loved it. I loved it! It would be awesome if the spoons were just a bit bigger. It holds like a 1/2 tsp. But it’s no big deal at all. They are sturdy and serve their purpose. I purchased these with some glasses for the floats. Memory-making kitchen ware. Soda floats are just so delicious.
customer_reviews.author: ACIII

customer_reviews.title: Good sundae spoons
customer_reviews.text: We do not use these spoons for ice-cream sundaes but we do use them on long neck jars, like jellies and jams, as well as olives and the like. They also do work on ice-cream.
customer_reviews.author: MandBinc

customer_reviews.title: Best spoon around
customer_reviews.text: These long handled spoons are very useful for the elderly. They have a nice balance, and are sturdy yet light. They do not slip down into the bowl or cup. Another great feature. The service the vendor provided was excellent, fast shipping, quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Bev calif

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying Root Beer Floats
customer_reviews.text: I love iced tea and my Mother loves ice cream floats. So realized needed some long handle spoon. Of course let my fingers "do the walking" and went straight to Amazon to purchase the product. Was very pleased with the price point, the number of spoons (aka wanted more than one but less than eight) and the rapid shipping options. Quickly received the purchase and am impressed with the high quality, care in packaging and functionality of these spoons. If you are in need of this type of item to add to your kitchen supplies would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: W from Melbourne FL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to reach down in powdered drink mixes (i.e. electrolytes) when I can no longer get my hand in there with the miniature scoop. This is perfect. Even though I bought solely for this purpose my family is enjoying using them to 1)eat ice cream 2) fill the dog's kong 3) stir extra large drinks, etc. These are sturdy. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kmssks

customer_reviews.title: Long spoons found!
customer_reviews.text: I never knew these elongated spoons were so hard to find! This was a great deal BTW. They arrived and my husband was impressed. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prefect!
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are everything I wished for. I needed a longer spoon that would allow me to mix chocolate milk without getting my fingers in the milk. These get the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Lefebvre

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: This spoon is extremely functional based solely on its convenient length. The material used is a good material but if it were a bit stiffer I'd have more confidence in its ability to be used with fluids with a thicker consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Tyzuki

customer_reviews.title: Fingers don't get drenched with coffee
customer_reviews.text: I bought this originally for stirring evaporated milk into Vietnamese egg coffee so I would not disturb the tasty layer of egg and sweetened condensed milk.It works beautifully! We also use these for stirring sugar in coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Raymer

customer_reviews.title: These long handle spoons are good quality and reminds me of the long spoons they ...
customer_reviews.text: These long handle spoons are good quality and reminds me of the long spoons they use in ice cream shops for the tall glasses..they have a good solid feel to them.. at first I was a little skeptical of purchasing them because the price was so reasonable, but I'm glad I did and I'm sure they will last me for many years..
customer_reviews.author: J. Nak

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: They're shiny and long enough for my iced tea. These spoons are suprisingly high quality spoons. The service was great, too! Arrived fast and in good condition. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: O.H.

customer_reviews.title: One of spoons has defect.
customer_reviews.text: One fo the handle part of the spoons has big scratch. (dent) It looks ugly.
customer_reviews.author: hailey

customer_reviews.title: They stir well lol what?
customer_reviews.text: But for real though. Picked these up because I was tired of dropping spoons in my post workout shakes and they are sturdy and plenty long enough for a standard glass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: JUST WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because I like having a longer handle for my taller glasses/mugs. I use them when I'm making a singular glass of something that has to be stirred or when I stir my tea in my travel mug (which is tall). I used to have a plastic one but it broke so I wanted something that would not break and I found it. The are perfect for my needs and were not expensive. My order arrived on time and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: MyLife7033

customer_reviews.title: these are perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! I have a long travel mug that I take my coffee in, but I put cream in it and would always have to use a knife to stir it. Silly, I know. However, these are perfect!!! Way better quality than I expected for the price, and customer service is awesome! They emailed to make sure everything was okay with the item. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stirring it up from the bottom of the glass
customer_reviews.text: I use drink mixes and I didn’t have the ice tea spoons with my stainless steel flatware. These have the perfect length to get to the bottom of my glasses. I like the weight and durability of these. I had picked up some previously at a restaurant supply store but they were lightweight and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best long spoon there can be
customer_reviews.text: These have the perfect length. The grip is comfortable. Great shine. Wash well. The spoon size itself is a tad smaller then an actual teaspoon but I don’t care since its mostly for reaching into anything tall to stir
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Good Longhandled Spoons
customer_reviews.text: These Hiware 9-inch long spoons are of good quality. Very sturdy. Easy to hold. They work well for what I bought them for: to get at the coffee grains at the bottom of the instant coffee jars. :)
customer_reviews.author: Sherrill Hart

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased a similar product in the past and loved them; however, these were not as good quality, the edges had a "sharper" feel, not as well finished. Seemed cheaper but they do the job.
customer_reviews.author: not aging gracefully

customer_reviews.title: Nice but a bit small
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for when we make milkshakes. They are nice but a bit small in my opinion. Overall though, I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cromer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought these to use with my smoothies - perfect for the long tall blender cups. Finish is holding up well. I do not use a dishwasher, so have only hand washed them but they are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: bmansc

customer_reviews.title: Great for the travel mug
customer_reviews.text: Tired of your fingers going in your coffee when you mix in your cream and sugar? I make coffee for my wife almost every morning and these work great for her 20oz travel mug. I use one everyday. (Had them for about 2 months at time of review). So far.... glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AdamZ

customer_reviews.title: they are not just spoons
customer_reviews.text: purchased this item as we have a new diet that requires shakes for breakfast, that are thick. so!!! we needed long spoons to use with our 24oz glasses. these are perfect.well made and durable, and are fun again like when we were kids and had a ice cream float at the 5 & 10, 60 years ago.Thank you for the spoons and the memories they bring back. HF
customer_reviews.author: Harry Fradin

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for tall glasses. Worth the money. Came sooner than expected. Love it. Exactly how it was described easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Poorness. If that were a real word I would use it.
customer_reviews.text: These spoons were rough, not shaped or polished well, and looked unfinished. I spent a lot of elbow grease filing the sharp edges so I could use them. If you buy these be careful so you don't cut your mouth. I used manicure buffers to file and polish the edges.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Michelle Toth

customer_reviews.title: Rounder than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Real happy with these but technically I'd think of them as barista spoons to sundae spoon, they have a rounder shape still an excellent product perfect for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: extra long spoons
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some nice iced-tea spoons when I got these. They are very sleek and a bit longer than the spoons that I had already. Really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lana G

customer_reviews.title: Look ok from far away but bad finishes
customer_reviews.text: The spoons are long enough but very inconsistent. The length and weight are ok, they feel sturdy. But the finishes are really bad. The edges on the bowl and the handle of the spoon show scratches, indents, and roughness. You can see it in the pictures. Running your finger up and down the side feels very rough as well. I would not order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Agent 13

customer_reviews.title: Long handled ice tea spoons
customer_reviews.text: I got these to use in small mouth jars, like mayonaise. They work wonderful. It keeps the mayo from getting all over the mouth of the jar and your fingers. I love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Lchambers

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Super long spoons that are strong.
customer_reviews.text: For the length of these they are quite sturdy. I use them for sharing ice cream and for my overnight oats. No complaints, high quality, and not expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jusburnin_dc5

customer_reviews.title: Ice tea tall spoons
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice long handled spoons, the best for your tall glasses. They are not fancy, have no embellishments on them, just a very sturdy spoon (4) Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: ellen libke

customer_reviews.title: I feel like a grownup rather than using a fork or knife!
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are awesome. I feel like a grown up with my tall mug or when stirring iced tea, rather than when I was always using a fork or knife!
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Queen

customer_reviews.title: strong 💪
customer_reviews.text: there small an long. the spoon part is small. but that's ok. you can get into jars at the bottom. not problem with it.
customer_reviews.author: Leolee

customer_reviews.title: Good set, as described
customer_reviews.text: We needed this set (a 2 of them actually) to complement our coffee corner. We usually use long coffee mugs / cups / tumblers, therefore length was a factor. Also we got tired of disposable wooden stirrers. After a couple of weeks of use i can safely say the finish quality is great and are durable.
customer_reviews.author: muze

customer_reviews.title: Great overall!
customer_reviews.text: Feels and appears very high quality and even seems to be a little longer than the average iced tea spoon, which is handy.
customer_reviews.author: Dobie

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty to use for the first few times, however they have since eroded and look worn after a few uses. If you are using these for decor only, they are perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great for coffee creamer
customer_reviews.text: I was fed up having to use a tea/tablespoon to scoop my coffee creamer out of that gigantic bottle. Both are just too short and I often scratched my fingers on the sharp plastic opening. Even worse when you get to the last quarter of the creamer and have to tilt that container to load your spoon. Then I saw those spoons on amazon and wondered if ... And it works wonderful! No more scratches and no more tilting! I can't believe I didn't think about that before. These particular spoons seem to be of nice quality and feel sturdy in the hand. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: NostalgicMom

customer_reviews.title: Scuffed, not aesthetically pleasing.
customer_reviews.text: These arrived scuffed and scratched on the handle and spoon parts. They're just utilitarian. Not in good enough condition to present or serve anything. I like how long they are. Will work for what I need it for, but I'm not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Swanwave

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Finally able to get to the bottom of a jelly jar or peanut butter tub without getting stuff on my hand! I know they're supposed to be tea spoons, but I use them for the reach. Haven't bent one yet. They are quite sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Erik W.

customer_reviews.title: More than Just Teaspoons
customer_reviews.text: I bought these spoons to scoop out every last bit of cat food from those crappy pouches. I was sick of getting the liquid and solids on my hand with a regular spoon. These were a steal for four. Good, good quality with a nice long handle that helps me avoid the gunk on my hands. They are actually quite pretty and would make great teaspoons for tall glasses. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Leveron

customer_reviews.title: Well made, nice looking, sturdy spoons.
customer_reviews.text: These are great spoons that are well made. I bought them to get the peanut butter out of the jar (the big jars from big box stores) when the jar is almost empty. They don't give any indication that they will bend at all. Well done. Nice looking too for using as a serving spoon for other fancier purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Linus's mom

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully simple
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are lovely. Heavy but also wonderfully easy to handle. The lines are sleek. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sister Laurel O'Neal, Er Dio

customer_reviews.title: Very well made spoons
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted these spoons and uses them daily, no issues so far in the dishwasher and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: SEAN T.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a spoon, but with a longer handle...
customer_reviews.text: Great long handle spoons. Just what we needed for root beer floats! Good thickness, without being heavy.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kim

customer_reviews.title: I love them I have been looking for long spoons forever
customer_reviews.text: I love them I have been looking for long spoons forever. I HAD 1 form when I stole it from an ice cream restaurant. I could never find them in any stores. SO thank you so much. If you want more sales put them in Wal-Mart this is an item that you realize you need it When you see it. Thank you best wishes and Happy Holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Good for getting the last bit of peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my nana after she complained about being unable to get at the bottom of the peanut butter jar. Haha! She was thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect. I like that they are sturdy, easy to hold. I use them for Blizzards and I can put them in dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Something else

customer_reviews.title: Ice Tea or Parfait
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are graceful and elegant, perfect for ice tea or ice cream parfaits in tall glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Bath

customer_reviews.title: Great Stainless Spoons
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my mom and she loves them. Used one myself the other day and very nice spoon. Simple yet elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: A Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i was looking for. I was tired of using a regular spoon to stir my tea. The long handled spoons are a simple design but very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: K. MontG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent length
customer_reviews.text: Great for use with iced tea and pitchers for stirring. Nicely shaped and sturdy. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Guidry

customer_reviews.title: The price is great but feels weird
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use with a malt machine. They are okay for that. Probably great for iced tea and stuff though.
customer_reviews.author: 40something

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Addition!
customer_reviews.text: A simple thing like an appropriately sized spoon for a milkshake (to get that last drop!) makes all the difference! These are simply a well made product that is reasonably priced, and a good good value!
customer_reviews.author: satisfied shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great for tall glasses
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are great for root beer/cream soda floats, sundaes, iced tea or anything in a tall glass
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: My husband now has a long-handle spoon/stirrer for his tall iced coffee and I have reclaimed a spoon. Fast delivery, great packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Elle G

customer_reviews.title: Stir tall glasses and still get the last of the mayo out of the jar.
customer_reviews.text: Had to order a set of 8 and a set of 4 to get the 12 I wanted. The spoons are great. Get every last bit of peanut butter out of the bottom of the jar!
customer_reviews.author: Martha K.

customer_reviews.title: It has a comfortable feel in my hand
customer_reviews.text: I wanted these spoons for coke floats in tall glasses. They work very well indeed. The bowl of the spoon is a trifle small and shallow, but it works very well. The handle feels very slender, but it has a lot more strength than it appears to have. It has a comfortable feel in my hand. I wouldn't use these spoons to scoop out rock-hard ice cream, but that is what an ice cream scoop is for.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what’s needed
customer_reviews.text: These long, slim spoons are perfect for stirring iced tea or for rescuing tea bags from the bottom of the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Orcutt

customer_reviews.title: It's a spoon!
customer_reviews.text: Nice design and dimensions. The end edges were a bit sharp. Nothing a few minutes with some fine sandpaper cannot fix, but the reason I only gave three stars for easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Hiware 9-Inch Long Handle Iced Tea Spoon, Coffee Spoon, Ice Cream Spoon, Stainless Steel Cocktail Stirring Spoons, Set of 4
feature_bullets: 9 inch long handle heavy-duty iced tea spoon can lead directly to the bottom of Ice cream soda glass, sundae and dessert cup, milk shake, tall coffee mugs
Made from high quality 18/8 stainless steel with extra thick ergonomics handle, durable high-polish finish, not rough and will never cut your hands and mouth
Superior to all on the market, modern design slender streamlined handle, easily mixes with existing flatware
Suitable for bar, home, party use, ideal for mixing drinks like lemonade iced tea, ice coffee, milkshakes, root beer floats and enjoying Sundaes, Bartending essential tool
Dishwasher-safe without harsh detergents, An exceptional value and an excellent gift for any occasion.
